org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group

Class MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer<LC extends HasTrainingUUID,K,V,IN extends Serializable,R extends Serializable,I extends Serializable,M extends Model,T extends GroupTrainerInput<K>,G,O extends Serializable,X,Y>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group.MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer<LC,K,V,IN,R,I,M,T,G,O,X,Y>
  • Type Parameters:
    LC - Type of local context.
    K - Type of data in GroupTrainerCacheKey keys on which the training is done.
    V - Type of values of cache used in group training.
    IN - Data type which is returned by distributed initializer.
    R - Type of final result returned by nodes on which training is done.
    I - Type of data which is fed into each training loop step and returned from it.
    M - Type of model returned after training.
    T - Type of input of this trainer.
    G - Type of distributed context which is needed for forming final result which is send from each node to trainer for final model creation.
    O - Type of output of postprocessor.
    X - Type of data which is processed by dataProcessor.
    Y - Type of data which is returned by postprocessor.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trainer<M,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainer

    public abstract class MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer<LC extends HasTrainingUUID,K,V,IN extends Serializable,R extends Serializable,I extends Serializable,M extends Model,T extends GroupTrainerInput<K>,G,O extends Serializable,X,Y>
extends Object
    Group trainer using Metaoptimizer. Main purpose of this trainer is to extract various transformations (normalizations for example) of data which is processed in the training loop step into distinct entity called metaoptimizer and only fix the main part of logic in trainers extending this class. This way we'll be able to quickly switch between this transformations by using different metaoptimizers without touching main logic.

      • extractContextForFinalResultCreation

        protected abstract IgniteSupplier<G> extractContextForFinalResultCreation(I data,
                                                                          LC locCtx)
        Extract context for final result creation. Each key from the final keys set will be processed with finalResultsExtractor. While entry data (i.e. key and value) for each key varies, some data can be common for all processed entries. This data is called context.
        Parameters:
        data - Data returned from last training loop step.
        locCtx - Local context.
        Returns:
        Context.

      • finalResultKeys

        protected abstract IgniteSupplier<Stream<GroupTrainerCacheKey<K>>> finalResultKeys(I data,
                                                                                   LC locCtx)
        Keys for final result creation.
        Parameters:
        data - Data returned from the last training loop step.
        locCtx - Local context.
        Returns:
        Stream of keys for final result creation.
